entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
